aboutMe.title: About Me
professionalSummary: I am Tarun Singh, a passionate and results-driven Software Developer and Software Engineer specializing in Frontend and Full Stack Development with expertise in Next.js, React, and scalable web architectures. I started with C++ and Python, and over time have built a strong command over modern web technologies, delivering production-grade applications across diverse industries.

Currently, I am contributing as a Software Engineer at DataNexify, where I architect and ship full-featured SaaS applications for platforms like Monday.com, focusing on workflow automation, cloud integrations, and user-centric functionality. My previous experience at Axtrum Solutions involved driving high-impact feature releases that boosted user satisfaction and performance metrics.

Proficient in the MERN stack and familiar with DevOps workflows, I continuously work to improve system scalability, performance, and maintainability. I value clean code, collaborative development, and solving real-world problems through intelligent digital solutions.
aboutMe.summary: Passionate Full Stack Software Engineer with 2.5+ years of experience specializing in Next.js, React, and scalable web architectures. Currently contributing at DataNexify, architecting full-featured SaaS applications with focus on workflow automation and cloud integrations. Proven track record of delivering high-quality, performant web applications and leading development teams.

experiences.title: Software Engineer – MERN Stack Developer
description: Engineered and deployed high-traffic Monday.com marketplace applications focused on automation and cloud interoperability.
Developed the PDF Builder App with real-time dynamic document generation used by over 1,000 users.
Built robust integrations with Google Calendar and Drive using secure OAuth2 workflows and field mapping.
Enhanced subitem-level workflow automation using logic-based rule configurations for complex use cases.
Improved authentication layers and implemented rate-limited API interactions to ensure platform stability.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer – MERN Stack, Next.js
description: Delivered custom web applications that improved client outcomes and increased user satisfaction scores by 30%.
Led implementation of responsive UI and performance optimization strategies, boosting engagement by 25%.
Adopted agile methodologies to accelerate project delivery, reducing launch timelines by 30%.
Collaborated cross-functionally to integrate APIs, handle state management, and ensure seamless frontend-backend coordination.

experiences.title: Backend Developer Intern
description: Gained full-stack development exposure while working on live projects involving MERN stack and MySQL.
Built and maintained reusable modules and integrated client feedback loops to improve UX on legacy applications.
Participated in the full SDLC with senior developers, contributing to backend architecture and database modeling.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering

projects.title: Monday.com Marketplace Apps
projects.description: Production-level workflow automation apps for Monday.com including PDF Builder, Google Calendar Sync, and Drive Sync. Features include OAuth2 security, custom field mapping, and real-time sync with robust error handling.

projects.title: BetterCommerce E-Commerce Platforms
projects.description: High-performance e-commerce storefronts with features like dynamic product catalogs, order processing, custom checkout flows, and DaMENSCH.com enhancements (size filters, return workflows).

projects.title: AI-Powered Content Management Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive content management platform leveraging AI to enhance UX and streamline content workflows. It features intelligent content suggestions, analytics dashboard, and real-time updates built on a robust frontend architecture.

projects.title: Recipe Maker: AI-Powered Recipe Generator
projects.description: A personalized recipe generation tool powered by Gemini AI, offering ingredient-based recommendations with a modern and responsive UI. Designed for optimal usability and customization.

projects.title: Pizza Order Online
projects.description: A responsive pizza ordering application with full authentication, REST APIs, cart management, and streamlined UX. Reduced average checkout time by 15 seconds based on user testing insights.

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: Built a scalable social media application featuring complete CRUD APIs, real-time updates, and optimized server response time (reduced from 300ms to 150ms) based on load testing.

projects.title: AI Travel Planner
projects.description: AI-powered travel planning app providing location-based itineraries. Integrates OpenAI APIs with serverless deployment, designed for real-time responsiveness and clean UX.
